attributes.action: release the harmonic data for the calculation of tide tables around the British Coasts to all who wish to use it free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is one of the only countries in the world where the harmonic variables used to calculate tide tables are deemed to be a copyright of the Crown. Currently Her Majesty's Government is requiring payment by any who wish to use and publish this data. As an aid to the safety of all shipping around the coast of Great Britain it is requested that this data be made available to any who require it, and who wish to publish the results either on paper or electronically.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "release the harmonic data for the calculation of tide tables around the British Coasts to all who wish to use it free of charge."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14602.asp

Prime Minister's Office
